mapper.sql: brandid, industryid, brandname, createuser, createtime, modifytime, state
mapper.insert: insert into tb_dini_brand (brandid, industryid, brandname, createuser, createtime, modifytime, state) values (#{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{industryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT})

state,

mapper.update:
update tb_dini_brand
industryid = #{industryid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brandname = #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where brandid = #{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_dini_brand set industryid = #{industryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brandname = #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where brandid = #{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_dini_brand b , tb_dini_industry y , tb_sys_user u WHERE b.industryid = y.industryid AND b.createuser = u.userid
AND b.brandname LIKE '%${brandVo.brandname}%'
AND b.`state` = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_dini_brand
AND brandname LIKE '%${brandVo.brandname}%'
AND state =0
